structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ORGANIZATION AND GOVERNMENT OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 243, sec. 9.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Journal of board of aldermen -- City documents to be public records.
